t: How to list a brand new item that has damaged package?
s: I’ve been assuming that “Used-Like New” (with a note something like “Brand new product, minor package damage”) would be acceptable to use for a brand new item that has minor damage to outside packaging. But, after looking at the condition guidelines, that doesn’t seem to be the case.

t: Dealing with Amazon Damaged Goods: Tips & Fixes
s: January 12, 2025 - Handling returns and reimbursements for damaged products requires careful documentation and adherence to Amazon’s guidelines. Sellers can take proactive steps to protect their brand and minimize the impact of customer-damaged returns.

t: Amazon
s: I have three items sold, and then after one or two weeks, Amazon informed me that two of them were marked as ''Customer Damaged'' and one as " Defective''. Here is the thing: Swear to god, the three items were freaking brand new when I shipped them to Amazon.

t: Returns and Replacements - FAQ - Amazon Customer Service
s: Products that are physically damaged, defective, has missing parts, or are different from their description in the product details page are eligible for return. You may also return products if you there is a change of mind and you do not wish to keep the item with you.

t: Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you have received a damaged, defective or if you are not happy with the product quality, you can return or replace the product.

t: Reimbursement for Customer-Damaged Returns
s: Additionally, I have return after return that wouldn't have been damaged if Amazon hadn't slapped a shipping label onto it and shipped it that way. Then when they get the item returned, they FURTHER the damage by cutting the label off. So now an entirely unopened item is completely unsellable, ...

t: Limited Warranty for Amazon Private Brands - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you are eligible, a replacement order or refund will be issued, and you'll be given instructions for returning the defective Product, postage paid. Failure to ship the damaged part or Product back to us may result in your being charged for the replacement part or Product at full retail price.

t: Items that You Cannot Return - Amazon Customer Service
s: Review the product's listing page before purchasing to confirm if it is not eligible for return. However, if an item arrives damaged, defective, unusable, materially different from what was ordered, please contact Customer Service.

t: How to Handle Damaged Goods from Amazon - ShipScience - Helping Businesses Ship Smarter
s: Brands like Packaging Factors and Uline offer reliable options. Protect your packages with anti-theft devices such as smart locks or secure drop boxes. Products from Smart Lock and Secure Drop Box can deter theft and ensure safe delivery. Third-party shipping insurance providers like InsureMyShip and Cargo Insurance offer comprehensive coverage options to protect your valuable shipments. Handling damaged goods from Amazon ...

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: A-to-z Guarantee for Property Damage and Personal Injury - Amazon Customer Service
s: The A-to-z Guarantee for Property Damage and Personal Injury protects in the rare instance where a defective product sold through Amazon.ca causes property damage or personal injury. This protection includes products sold by Amazon.ca or by one of our third-party sellers.

t: Amazon Resale: Understanding Product Conditions - Amazon Customer Service
s: Explore Amazon Resale's condition ratings: Renewed, Used Like New, Used Very Good, Used Good, and Used Acceptable. Learn what each term means for Amazon Resale items.
